preprocessing.4_decode_hex: Convert valid hex codes (#0000FF → blue approximation)

semantic_filtering.rationale:
Based on analysis:
- Threshold 0.35 excludes obvious spam/noise
- Keeps ~85% of names
- Low similarity names are clearly not colors
- Autoencoder approach flawed (doesn't understand non-ASCII)

keep_if: Name contains recognizable color word (secondary check)
filter_if: Name is a question or sentence (> 5 words)

grouping.rationale:
Group names with high cosine similarity (> 0.95)
This catches: grey/gray, colour/color, light blue/lightblue
